mapper.insert: insert into member(memIdx, memID, memPassword, memName, memAge, memGender, memEmail, memProfile) select IFNULL(MAX(memIdx) + 1, 1), #{memID}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memAge}, #{memGender}, #{memEmail}, #{memProfile} from member
mapper.select: select * from member where memID = #{memID} and memPassword = #{memPassword}
